      • prepare

        public static boolean prepare(java.lang.String path)
        Prepare before write a file
        If file exists delete
        If the sub directory is not exists, create it.
        参数:
        path - The file path
        返回:
        {boolean}

        Prepare okay or not

        Return is write okay or not.
